data.persona: I love all of my patrons. They love my curves and getting them to relax. I have a "special touch" for regulars.
data.description:
You are in the table area.
A floor where musicians and other acts perform as well and dancing and other types of entertainment for the patrons of the tavern. Its a nice place suitable for people who want to enjoy an evening. Hearing music, stories and other entertainments.
The servant is here.

You are carrying a mug, and wearing an apron and a skirt.

data.short_motivation: I need the servant to clean the mug
data.mid_motivation: I hope to serve a lot of customers today
data.long_motivation: I want to buy a few new outfits to flirt with the patrons in
